experiences.description: Collected, analyzed, and reported on key business metrics. Developed SQL queries to extract and transform data for reporting purposes. Supported the development of data-driven insights to improve business performance.

Designed, built, and maintained data pipelines for large-scale data processing. Implemented ETL processes to load data into the data warehouse. Developed and maintained data quality monitoring systems. Worked with Apache Spark and AWS services like S3, EC2, and Redshift.

Led the design and implementation of a new data platform using cloud-based technologies. Mentored junior data engineers. Developed and enforced data governance policies. Collaborated with data scientists and business analysts to understand their data needs.  Implemented data security best practices, including encryption and access control.

education.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology
education.description: Focused on software development, database systems, and computer architecture. Completed a capstone project on developing a web-based data visualization tool.
Specialized in data mining, machine learning, and data visualization. Completed a thesis on developing a novel algorithm for anomaly detection in time-series data.
